sentences.en: If you domesticate this raccoon, it will have trouble living in the wild.
sentences.cn: 如果你驯养这只浣熊, 它生活在野外将会有困难.

sentences.en: Many thousand years ago people learned how to domesticate animals.
sentences.cn: 数千年以前人们就学会了饲养动物.

sentences.en: Objective: to do domesticate cultivation of Asarum heteropodies Fr.
sentences.cn: 目的: 驯化栽培北细辛、华细辛.

sentences.en: She wanted to domesticate it , I wanted make a present of the homestead and move out.
sentences.cn: 她想留它下来驯养.可我却认为,把我们的住所送给雷龙,我们搬走为上策.

sentences.en: Some men are very hard to domesticate.
sentences.cn: 有些男人很难做好家务活。

sentences.en: We domesticated the dog to help us with hunting.
sentences.cn: 我们驯养狗来帮助我们打猎。

words.tran_cn: 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的
家养的；驯服的；喜欢家庭生活的
国内地；家庭式地；适合国内地
家庭生活；专心于家务；对家庭的挚爱
驯养（domesticate的过去分词）；使习惯于家庭生活

trans.tran_en: to make an animal able to work for people or live with them as a pet

trans.tran_cn: 驯养，使爱家，适应家庭生活，引进
trans.tran_en: to make an animal able to work for people or live with them as a pet
